name: Point and Case: BA2a Jam 3/4
description:
My 3rd pushed to 4th Solo Games jam for University (Yr2). This is a section of an Ace Attorney inspired 'Who Dunnit?' game I'm developing.

If you've played and have time to help me improve on this please do!!

Feedback Form : https://forms.gle/sse9MTAFgJYpVshs9

Code, 2D, 3D, some SFX and Voice created by me [VA's are myself and 2 friends]

Please bare with our ameture voice acting! It was taken to test how it work with the overall code/feel of the game

Some of the SFX and the BGM are provided by Freesound.org
